dmca.title: Church of LDS  Instructs Scribders
dmca.body:
Dr. Mr. [Recipient]:

Intellectual Reserve, Inc ("IRI") is the owner of the copyright in an original work entitled Church Handbook of Instructions, Book I: Stake Presidencies and Bishoprics (the "Church Handbook of Instructions"). The copyright in the Church Handbook of Instructions is registered with the U.S. Copyright Office, and a copy of the Certificate of Copyright Registration is attached hereto.

IRI has a good faith belief that the material posted or available for download at http://scribd.com/doc/52827/LDS-Church-Handbook-of-Instructions is an unlawful reproduction of Church Handbook of Instructions, infringes IRI's copyright in the Church Handbook of Instructions, and is not authorized by IRI, its agents, or the law. IRI requests that you act expeditiously to remove or disable access to this item.

I may be contacted at:

[Sender]
Director, Intellectual Property Division
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
[Private]
Phone:[Private}
Fax: [Private]
Email: [Sender@Private.org]
dmca.principal_name: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
